string.text: My lord, I note that you have not yet taken a spouse.
My lord, I note that you might wish for a new spouse.
Goodman, I note that you have not yet taken a wife.
Goodwife, I wish to profess myself your most ardent admirer.
Goodman, may you give me another chance to prove myself?
Goodwife, may you give me another chance to prove myself?
